GTK's JColorChooser is rather buggy and doesn't play well with added panels. 
Put in a ugly hack to switch to the Metal L&F when initializing the
JColorChooser and switch back once done.  The color chooser will now launch and
function properly.

The use of the ColorPropertyEditor on the LineBorderPropertyPage doesn't pick up
this hack, but the JColorChooser works fairly well with the GTK L&F by
coincidence, but is still fairly messed up due to Sun bug 5027338.

Need to take a look at this again once Sun cleans up the problems with the GTK L&F.

Released NamedColorChooserPanel and ColorPropertyEditor to fix the NPE and
implement the hack.
M1 released, move all resolved to Verified, as prelude to closing.
M1 released, move all resolved/verified to Closed.
